name: meridian-ai-workspace
description: Meridian AI workspace with React frontend and TypeScript backend

scripts.install:all: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix backend install
scripts.setup:env: sh -c 'if [ -f .env ]; then echo ".env already exists (leaving it unchanged)"; else cp .env.example .env && echo "Created .env from .env.example"; fi'
scripts.start:backend:py: node scripts/with-root-env.js sh -c "cd backend_py && python3 -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${APP_PORT:-8000}"
scripts.dev: echo "Use separate terminals: npm run dev:backend and npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend:py: node scripts/with-root-env.js sh -c "cd backend_py && python3 -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${APP_PORT:-8000} --reload"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm --prefix frontend run test && npm --prefix backend run test
scripts.compose:up: docker compose up -d postgres redis backend_py_api backend_py_worker
scripts.compose:logs: docker compose logs -f --tail=150 backend_py_api backend_py_worker postgres redis
